description:
This event provides you with a chance to show off strong and effective communication skills and the opportunity to gain the ability to convey facts along with overcoming your stage fear.
 Round 1(Group Discussion): A topic will be provided. Every group will be given 3 minutes to discuss the given topic. Participants will be selected for the next round based on the judging criteria.
 Round 2(Debate): To teams of 2, a topic will be provided. The team will either be on the affirmative side or on the negative side. Each team will be given a time of 2 minutes for pulling their points together and 7 minutes for the Debate.
rules: Number of rounds: 2
Time required: 4 hr
Participants must follow the given timing, as the rounds will start on time.
Two - three teams will be clubbed to form one group for round 1, i.e., Group Discussion.
After qualifying 1st round, teams of two will participate in the 2nd round, i.e., Debate.
There will be a time limit of 7 mins for each topic so one of the team must conclude so as to complete each round in the given time limit.
Interrupting a speaker is forbidden.
Speakers are expected to use appropriate language and avoid controversial topics

description: Perplexo is an event where you get to test your knowledge in the wide domain of the Internet and Technology. It is an event  consisting of a series of questions, a trail of hints followed by a sequence of surprisingly tricky answers along with a live ranking leaderboard. We return with greater difficulty, tougher ciphers and deeper trails. You have to be more attentive, cautious and aware than at any time you are. Push your limits, bend the rules and crack the code. Last year only one was able to reach level 6, but none completed the challenge.
rules: Group size : 2 max
Duration : 24hrs
Groups can login and submit answers any time in the active window time
Any group found obtaining answers by unfair means will be immediatly disqualified and the decision will be final

description: This event will test aptitude and verbal skills. Aptitude questions will be similar to questions asked in competitive exams and placement tests. Verbal questions will be based on text completion where participants will have to choose the word that best completes the sentence.
rules: Number of rounds: 2
Time required: 2 hrs
Solo participation.
Participants must follow given timing, as the rounds will start on time.

description: This event will test your competitiveness, logic and data structure skills . It is an individual event. There will be 2 rounds. Each round will have a time limit of 2hrs. The first round will test your logical and  basic data structure skills. And the second round will test your competitive and advanced data structure skills. Each problem will have a predetermined score. A participant’s score depends on the number of test cases a participant’s code submission successfully passes. Participants are ranked by the score. If two or more participants achieve the same score, then the tie is broken by the total time taken to submit the last solution resulting in a higher score.
rules: Score will depend on the number of test cases passed
Solve the questions within the time limit.
If 2 people have to be found with the same code, it will result in your immediate disqualification from the contest.
No electronic devices should be used while giving the contest.
Shortlisted participants of Round I will be applicable for Round ll.
In case of tie, then it will be broken by the total time taken to submit the last solution.

description: Innovation and entrepreneurship are the wheels that steer the world into a brighter future. Startup mania will help in innovating new ideas right from acknowledging the potential of your idea, steering your ideas in the right direction and scrutinizing your views which will pave the way for glaring success. In the idea presentation round, every team has to present their ideas using the template provided.The institute will provide guidance and funding to all innovative startup ideas.
rules: Every group should have 2-4 members.
An individual can be a member of just one team.
You can present your idea in any language: English, Hindi, Marathi.A whatsapp group will be made with all participants in it. All the official communication will happen through this group only.
All the participants are requested to reach the venue 10 minutes before the event commences.

A template will be provided for the idea presentation round through whatsapp group. All groups are requested to use that template for their presentations.Presentations should be completed within 8-10 minutes.
If the presentation goes overtime, then points will be deducted accordingly.
All the groups are requested to carry soft copies of their PPTs.
In case we found copyright from some resource, those teams will be disqualified.
Decision of the judges will be final.

tagLine: Let's make another life in the maps of BGMI
description: Battlegrounds Mobile India is an online multiplayer battle royale game developed and published by Krafton. The game is exclusively for Indian users.
rules: Squad entry only (Team size : 1-4 players)
Maps- Erangel, Sanhok, Miramar
Players should enter the game room within the given time or he/she will be directly disqualified and no queries will be entertained later.

description: This event is about web development. There will be two rounds.Technologies allowed are: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. From the second round winner and runner-up will be declared based on unique and innovative designs.
rules: Participants should stick to the time limit.
Minimum two web pages are required.
Only technologies mentioned in the description can be used.
In round-1 if two participants acquire a similar score, based on time taken one of the candidates will be selected for the next round.
If copyright for any design from any resource is found, they will be disqualified.
Participants can carry their personal laptops.
Evaluation will be done based on the uniqueness of design , time taken and understandability of the code.

description: A real time great IPL Auction of 140 players. Auction will consist of 8 teams, every team will bid for 140 players as well as for their desired team. All 140 players in the list are assigned with their ratings, each team has to submit their playing 11.Final team rating will be calculated according to the submitted playing 11.Team with highest points on the basis of rating will be declared as winner. Come and enjoy the IPL Auction in REAL.
rules: Detailed rules can be viewed here : Rules
Each Team given a Budget:  90 CR
Time required - 4 hours.
Judging criteria - Average of Rating of Players the Team owns.
Minimum 11 and maximum 15 player
Cap Rating will be x2  ,Vice captain ×1.5
Min 3 members per team and maximum 5 can participate in the auction.
Base price for team name bidding 50 Lakhs.
1 RTM free for every team
Auction will be conducted for 1 extra RTM if required (Base Price 20 lakh)
Auction for 1 RTS (Base Price 20 Lakh)

description: Have you seen a lot of movies and TV shows? Now is the time to put your memory to good use.Win a huge prize by answering difficult questions based on them. Take part in this fantastic quiz game based on movies and television series.
rules: Detailed rules can be viewed here : Rules
Number of rounds - 4
Time required - 3 hours.
(Round 1 - Andaaz Apna Apna) - There would be a quiz containing 25 questions based on jumbled dialogues ,silest video and audio. It will be performed on kahoot online quiz platform.
(Round 2 - Yaaron ki Baarat ) - Random groups will be formed.Act and Guess the movie in time.
(Round 3 - Humshakals) - Identify the blended pictures of several actors and actresses.
(round 4 - Agneepath) - Finale round, Buzzer based rapid fire.

description:
Participants can choose any of the 3 art forms i.e. dancing, singing or photography. Theme or content can be decided by the participants themselves. Video/Photo submissions are expected of 2-3 Mins(for video) and .jpg or.jpeg for Photograph. There will be a single round for each category. Winner and runner ups will be selected based on the Quality art form submitted. 
 For photography: contestants would have to click a photograph by any device. A slight editing would be permitted for the picture. The event is to be in order to encourage students to enhance their talent and hidden creativity to click something in a special way.
rules: Participants should stick to the time limit
They can select only 1 of the 3 art forms for submission.
If copyright from any resource is found, they will be disqualified.
The Photograph should be clicked after the contest is announced.
The photograph should contain a timestamp on it.

description: Chess is one of the oldest and most popular board games. It is played by two opponents on a checkered board with specially designed pieces of contrasting colours, commonly white and black. The objective of the game is to capture the opponent's king. It will be a knockout match
rules: Players should enter the game room within the given time or he/she will be directly disqualified and no queries will be entertained later.
The game format will be 10+0 knockout match(10 mins no increment)
Touch to move as long as it's a legal move
3 illegal moves will lead to disqualification
In case of stalemate/draw, 1 min bullet game will be conducted.

description: An event which allows you to showcase your problem solving skills,team effort and quick thinking.Round 1: In this round you will have to solve some tricky riddles to prove that you are smarter than the maximum crowd.Round 2 : In this round you will have to showcase your ability of quick thinking and solve the pictorial puzzles. Round 3 : This is the actual test of team work where you will be given a situation having some real life problems and you have to draw practical solutions for the same.Your Brains will reach the Melting Point. The Stronger Brain wins it All.
rules: Detailed rules can be viewed here : Rules
Number of rounds - 3
Time required - 2.5 hours.
Judging criteria - pre-answered question, Judges for last round.
Solve the Mystery (Round 1)- Try to solve the mystery.
Can You C It!!! (Round 2)- Have a brief look and Decode the picture.
The Perfect Strategy (Round 3)- Given a real time situation; Brainstorm the best solutions to it and explain it to judges along with your team.
Decisions made by judges will be final. (3 judges)

description: Hackathon is a technical event wherein participants have to implement their innovative ideas and develop their projects within the stipulated time. The project must be based on any Computer Science relevant technologies. (eg. Web App, Android App, IoT, ML models, Networks, Security and Automation).There will be two rounds. In the first round, participants have to submit their idea with a project synopsis and have to implement their ideas in a given amount of time followed by a presentation (Review 1). After evaluation of the first round, qualified teams including domain winners will be selected for the next round. Qualified teams need to implement suggestions/changes given by the reviewer at a specific time followed by the final presentation.
rules: Detailed rules can be viewed here : Rules
Clashes of hackathon with other events will not be adjusted
Teams must report by 8:30 am on 22nd March 2022
On the Second day (23rd March 2022) qualified teams must report by 10:00 am for the final presentation and declaration of winners will be done.
All participants must be present on time and follow deadlines.
Standard Synopsis format should be followed strictly.
All group members should be present during the presentation and in their allotted places throughout the event.
The result and winners identified by judges will be final and non-negotiable under any condition.
All participants must agree to run-time changes(if any).

description: From a backspin to a topspin, drive to a smash, give it all you have to prove your mettle. use this event as an opportunity to show off your table tennis skills and competer.
rules: 3 sets will be played, each of 11 points. The best 2 of 3 will be considered.
Standard TT rules will be followed
The decision of the referee will be final.
You may bring your own rackets.
